title: Massimo Giuliani
text:
Massimo Giuliani (born February 5, 1951) is an Italian <a href="actor">actor</a> and <a href="voice%20actor">voice actor</a>.
Biography.
Born in Rome, Giuliani began his career debut at four years of age. Giuliani had an intensifying experience as a <a href="child%20actor">child actor</a> throughout the 1950s and 1960s on cinema and television. His first film appearance was in the 1956 film "<a href="Supreme%20Confession">Supreme Confession</a>" and he also voiced <a href="King%20Arthur">Arthur</a> in the Italian-Language dub of the 1963 animated film "<a href="The%20Sword%20in%20the%20Stone%20%281963%20film%29">The Sword in the Stone</a>". This marked Giuliani's first dubbing contribution. He still continues acting as an adult.
As a voice actor, Giuliani is well known for providing the Italian voice of <a href="Fozzie%20Bear">Fozzie Bear</a> in "<a href="The%20Muppets">The Muppets</a>" as well as <a href="List%20of%20Ice%20Age%20characters%23Buck">Buck</a> from the "<a href="Ice%20Age%20%28franchise%29">Ice Age</a>" film series and from 1996, he was the main Italian voice of <a href="Bugs%20Bunny">Bugs Bunny</a> from "<a href="Looney%20Tunes">Looney Tunes</a>" until he passed on the role to <a href="Davide%20Garbolino">Davide Garbolino</a> in 2007. Giuliani has also dubbed <a href="Mel%20Gibson">Mel Gibson</a>, <a href="Dudley%20Moore">Dudley Moore</a>, <a href="John%20Belushi">John Belushi</a>, <a href="Billy%20Crystal">Billy Crystal</a>, <a href="John%20Candy">John Candy</a>, <a href="Andy%20Garc%C3%ADa">Andy García</a> and <a href="Warwick%20Davis">Warwick Davis</a> in some of their projects.
Giuliani is also an avid <a href="Association%20football">football</a> fan. In the 1960s, he participated in a football youth squad but he left after four months due to his obligations as a child actor. In the early 2000s, he sparked controversy for impersonating footballer <a href="Francesco%20Totti">Francesco Totti</a> on the show '. He has also made appearances at '.
Personal life.
Giuliani is married to dubbing director Tiziana Lattuca. He is also the father of voice actor Daniele Giuliani and the uncle of voice actress <a href="Claudia%20Catani">Claudia Catani</a>.
